pages.title: Spell Books
pages.text: $(key)Spell books$() are containers for spells. With the $(mage/bind)Spell Binding Table$(), you can turn a regular book into the most basic $(key)Apprentice Spell Book$(). But that's only the beginning â€” later, you can use $(mage/infusion)Enchantment Infusion$() to upgrade it into $(bold)Novice/Intermediate/Advanced$() $(key)Spell Books$().$(br2)$(bold)$(#cccc00)Lightning$() and $(bold)$(#3ea29f)Soul$() schools do not have an $(key)Apprentice Spell Book$(); you must craft a $(key)Novice Spell Book$() directly.

pages.title: Advanced Spell Books
pages.text: Higher-tier $(key)spell books$() provide more $(key)spell slots$().$(br2)You can put $(mage/scroll)spell scrolls$() into $(bold)Novice/Intermediate/Advanced$() $(key)Spell Books$() (similar to putting items into a storage bag). The $(key)Apprentice Spell Book$() does not support this.
